column2: title=Sotheby's The James S. Copley Library 17 June 2010
image=[[Image:Sothebys The James S. Copley Library 17 June 2010.jpg]]

column1: '''''Sotheby's The James S. Copley Library 17 June 2010''''' is an auction catalogue from [[Sotheby's]] (New York), which includes a transcribed excerpt from a letter from [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] to [[Evelyn B. Byrne]] (see [[Letter to Evelyn B. Byrne]]).
